name: Red&Blue (Alt_Merklein)
description:
This is a first person shooter game where you have to get to the end of the levels (currently only 2 levels including the tutorial). Changing your viewmode between blue/red is essential since you can never have a complete vision of the scenes without doing it. 

All used assets are from the unity asset store.

Musics: Neon Shadows.  Sound Effects: UI_Buttons_Pack 2, Combat_Whooshes_Sounds, Scifi Guns SFX Pack.

Obs: The pause key is the Esc key, which may be an issue when playing fullscreen. I might change the pause key in later updates.
